idea-plugin.name: SimpleConvert
idea-plugin.description:
Automatic entity conversion.
introduction
  • Automatically convert various entities, such as from DO to VO, supporting arrays and multi-level nested objects. You only need to define the methods properly. Move the cursor to the method class and press a shortcut key to complete everything.
  • The default shortcut key for MacOs is command + shift + L
  • The default shortcut keys for Windows are ctrl, shift and L
